index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND HUMAN SERVICES
DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the HOME program; accepting a $2,588,000 grant from the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development; authorizing execution of a HOME Investment Partnership Agreement and related documents; appropriating HOME funds for housing programs; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
committee: Housing, Health, Human Services and Education
